Wheeljack-X::

"Somebody say something about a maintenance drone?" Jackie calls from 
down the hall, overhearing him.  "I can whip one up for you if you 
need one."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He nods at Kup.  "Sir, there is something you need to know 
about the 
> disease the girl escaped from.  It is known only as The Plague.  
It's effects 
> are both swift and deadly.  Fortunately it's deadliness eventually 
killed it 
> off enough for those of my time to develop a vaccine.  
Unfortunately she is 
> from a few decades before my time.  She doesn't appear to be 
infected 
> however."  He pauses for a moment.  "There were rumored accounts, 
nothing was 
> ever confirmed mind you, but I have heard stories of carriers.  
Some have 
> been infected but survive without symptoms for some unknown 
reason.  There is 
> a way to test."  He thinks to himself for a moment.  "First, if 
Windlord 
> hasn't been bitten, get him out of there.  There's something in the 
bite that 
> transmits the disease.  Then I need to borrow an expendable 
maintenance 
> drone."
